participant_1.background:
I live in a place with a warm climate where I can keep my iguana.
My family members all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
I don't know much about my parents.
i am not going to go the extra mile anymore.
I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to share my love of reading and cooking with you.
I dress to impress, even when my heart is broken.
I went to the beach and relaxed.
I check my phone to see if there are any messages.
I am a mystery buff and live in London.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hello! It is going well. I just came back from the beach. I had a great time.
I am glad to hear that. I love the beach. I live in a warm climate where I can keep my iguana.
That is awesome! I wish I could keep an iguana. I love animals, but I live in London.
I love animals too. My family and I all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
That is really nice. It is important to have a common interest with your family.
I agree. I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship.
That is a sweet sentiment. I love reading and cooking. I would love to share those things with you sometime.
That sounds like fun! I would love to learn more about mystery novels.
I would love to teach you! I am a mystery buff and live in London.
